title: Fullstack Developer
description: I was part of a team of 3 people who developed various web applications, the key projects being the following:

projects.title: DISEM
projects.description: An internal web application which consists of a dashboard dedicated to managing forecast data from their internal database and send forecast data to beneficiaries (via authentication in the application or FTP)

projects.title: bestvalueprint.ro
projects.description: A B2B online shop for printers which can be partially accessed by guests, and fully accessed by partner customers
